definition: to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
a devastating criticism/to expose hidden motives
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
Look out for yourself, or heaven and earth will combine to destroy you./Every man for himself, and the Devil take the hindmost.
pinyin: ren2 bu4 wei4 ji3 , tian1 zhu1 di4 mie4

definition: Sun Zhu (1711-1778), poet and compiler of Three Hundred Tang Poems 唐詩三百首|唐诗三百首[Tang2 shi1 San1 bai3 Shou3]/also known by assumed name 蘅塘退士[Heng2 tang2 Tui4 shi4]
to die by battle-ax (idiom); to be executed
steal the whole country and they make you a prince, steal a hook and they hang you (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子)
pinyin: qie4 guo2 zhe3 hou2 , qie4 gou1 zhe3 zhu1

definition: steal a hook and they hang you, steal the whole country and they make you a prince (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子)
pinyin: qie4 gou1 zhe3 zhu1 , qie4 guo2 zhe3 hou2

definition: to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)

sentences.english: Dream Zhu Xian, claws can spend to buy a good number of RMB?
sentences.chinese: 夢幻誅仙想買個好爪子能花多少RMB？

sentences.english: Her boyfriend fed a box of oxygen and hydrogen to the ox and fox.
sentences.chinese: 誅仙前傳焚香谷男朋友給牛和狐狸餵了一盒子氧和氫。

sentences.english: Does dream put the mutant young immortal snowball baby to death how much being?
sentences.chinese: 夢幻誅仙小雪球變異寶寶多少錢？

sentences.english: White light heart, after such, jumped, under the table.
sentences.chinese: 白淺傷心欲絕，產子後，縱身躍下誅仙台。

definition: to slander/to defame/to speak ill of
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
(literary) (final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 呢[ne5] or 啊[a1])
to slander/to defame/to misrepresent/to speak maliciously
